author: mgrigorov
msg: UrlResourceStream closes incorrect InputStream causing stacktraces on undeploy on GlassFish
Cache the input stream to be able to close it when the connection creates a new stream for each call of #getInputStream().

msg: [CAMEL-4777] Features now uses jetty or war features in place of referencing geronimo-servlet, geronimo-jsp, geronimo-el

msg: Change some variable declaration to restrict the scope.

author: mgrigorov
msg: UrlResourceStream closes incorrect InputStream causing stacktraces on undeploy on GlassFish
Cache the input stream to be able to close it when the connection creates a new stream for each call of #getInputStream().
